Title: Armed intervention cannot scare the peoples that strive for independence
Designer: Zhang Ruji (张汝济)Sha Gengsi (沙更思)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社) Beijing
Notes: The poster refers to the "Lebanon Crisis" of 1958. The wolf wears a hat with 美帝 - (imperialist) America
Theme: Foreign imperialistsForeign Friends: National Liberation Movements
